{{Infobox NFL season | team = Jacksonville Jaguars | year = 2006 | record = 8â8 | division_place = 3rd [[AFC South]] | coach = [[Jack Del Rio]] | stadium = [[Jacksonville Municipal Stadium|ALLTEL Stadium]] | playoffs = ''did not qualify'' | uniform = File:AFCS-2004-2007-Uniform-JAX.PNG }} The '''[[2006 NFL season|2006]] [[Jacksonville Jaguars]] season''' was the 11th season for the team in the [[National Football League]].
